channel.title: Afghanistan Cricket on BalleWale Cricket News
channel.description: Recent content in Afghanistan Cricket on BalleWale Cricket News

item.title: Trott Pleased with Naib at No. 3, Defends Non-Selection of Noor
item.description: Trott expresses satisfaction with Naib's performance at No. 3 while justifying the decision to exclude Noor from the squad.

item.title: Rashid: Playing International Cricket in Afghanistan 'More Than a Dream'
item.description: Afghan cricketer Rashid Khan shares his heartfelt sentiments about representing Afghanistan on the international stage, emphasizing the significance of cricket for his nation.
